By listing your video game on Bean, you agree to the following terms and conditions: 
1. You must have a valid Bean account and be over the age of 18. 
2. You must not list any video games that contain violence, profanity, or any other inappropriate content. 
3. You must not use Bean to engage in any illegal activities, including but not limited to money laundering, fraud, or theft. 
4. You must not spam or harass other Bean users, or use the platform for any commercial purposes without our prior written permission. 
5. You must keep your contact information up-to-date and respond to any inquiries or complaints from Bean or other users in a timely and professional manner. 
6. You must not use Bean to infringe on the intellectual property rights of any third party, including but not limited to copyrights, trademarks, or patents. 
7. You must not list any video games that are damaged, defective, or otherwise not in good working condition. 
8. You must not list any video games that are counterfeit, fake, or otherwise not genuine. 
9. You must not list any video games that are banned, restricted, or otherwise not allowed to be sold on Bean. 
10. You must not list any video games that are too heavy, too big, or otherwise not suitable for shipping via the Bean delivery service. 
11. You must not list any video games that are related to pandas, penguins, or any other cute animals. 
12. You must not list any video games that are related to unicorns, rainbows, or any other mythical creatures. 
13. You must not list any video games that are related to aliens, spaceships, or any other extraterrestrial objects. 
14. You must not list any video games that are related to time travel, parallel universes, or any other science fiction concepts. 
15. You must not list any video games that are related to hot air balloons, skydiving, or any other adventurous activities. 
16. You must not list any video games that are related to politics, religion, or any other sensitive topics. 
17. You must not list any video games that are related to chocolate, ice cream, or any other sweets. 
18. You must not list any video games that are related to math, science, or any other boring subjects. 
19. You must not list any video games that are related to ghosts, vampires, or any other supernatural entities. 
20. You must not list any video games that are related to love, romance, or any other mushy feelings. 

By listing your video game on Bean, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. We reserve the right to change, modify, or update these terms and conditions at any time without notice. If you do not agree to these terms and conditions, please do not list your video game on Bean. Thank you for using our platform!
